metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3245 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in the chfn function in libuser before0.56.13-8 and 0.60 before 0.60-7, as used in the userhelper program in theusermode package, allows local users to cause a denial of service(/etc/passwd corruption) via a newline character in the GECOS field.

criterions.comment: libuser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
